ModMetaData.name: Madness Pawns
ModMetaData.author: SamBucher
ModMetaData.description: Makes RimWorld's human pawns look like grunts from Madness Combat Everyone will have the same body and head type, and no hair Options to toggle hair rendering and RimWorld's vanilla female body for female pawns are present Inspired by the Newgrounds animated series Madness Combat by Krinkels, make sure to check it out
